forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 48F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
